author: Simon Kent, Simon Kent
title: U.S. Coronavirus Deaths Hit 2,000 After Doubling in Two Days
description: In the space of 48-hours the U.S. death toll from the Chinese cornonavirus pandemic passed 2,000 late Saturday, figures confirm.
content:
In the space of 48-hours the U.S. death toll from the Chinese cornonavirus pandemic passed 2,000 late Saturday, figures confirm. Of those fatalities, 672 have been counted in New York City alone.
Earlier this week, the death toll in the U.S. reached 1,000, t… [+1574 chars]
